sent_1.text: Ninety - three patients received alemtuzumab in 21 centers worldwide , with the aim to obtain an overall response rate of at least 20 % .

sent_2.text: Dosage was increased gradually ( target 30 mg , 3 times weekly , for a maximum of 12 weeks ) .

sent_3.text: Infection prophylaxis was mandatory , beginning on day 8 , and continuing for a minimum of 2 months after treatment .

sent_4.text: Responses were assessed at weeks 4 , 8 , and 12 , and patients were followed for 34 months .
